title: Print, ca. 1980 reproduction of 1915–1925 original
medium: Color lithograph on heavy white wove paper
markings: Publisher's monogram embossed, lower left:  FM [Franca Manchini]
signed: Printed in gray, lower right corner:  BALLA/FUTURISTA
description: Two angel figures with long gray hair and wearing gray and pink flowing costume in lower center.  Above their joined arms, a large blue sphere with standing nude woman (Lady Sky) inside.  A line of gray trees, on either side of Lady Sky.  Several sketchy horizontal blue lines, perhaps suggesting horizon, across upper edge of sheet,

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, ca. 1980 reproduction of 1915–1925 original.
ca. 1980 reproduction of 1915–1925 original. Color lithograph on heavy white wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen. 1999-6-5-10.
